description:
Something dark and sinister was released from that stone coffin. Rain is pouring down, the seas are churning, and... a turtle statue just came to life?! His name is Matsumoto, and he knows the truth behind what`s happening.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heart of the Ring, Heart of the Priestess
Yubiwa no Kokoro Miko no Kokoro
指輪の心 巫女の心
